name: Depth of Extinction
description: Explore a flooded world and save humanity from a terrible threat in this turn based, tactical RPG with roguelike elements
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+ Processor: Processor: 2.0 GHz or faster processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics: 3D graphics card with at least 256MB of addressable memory DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 600 MB available space
